title: Pirelli Scorpion Gravity teases EWS & DH race tires developed with MTB legend Fabien Barel
content:
Working with downhill MTB legend Fabien Barel, Pirelli is set to release their next level of DH & EWS race-ready Scorpion Gravity Racing mountain bike tires. The prototype gravity tires are being thrashed down the mountain now, being tested on the EWS & DH World Cup race circuits before an imminent launch for consumers… Pirelli […]

The post Pirelli Scorpion Gravity teases EWS & DH race tires developed with MTB legend Fabien Barel appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
